name: Apollo 111
description:
Apollo 111 is a strategy game made for Ludum Dare 52.

You're on mission to a new planet, and it's your goal to keep your crew alive until your reach your destination.

Farm crops, build solar panels and explore asteroids to gather resources to help you on your journey. Take care of everyone making sure you have enough food as the crew gets bigger and bigger with time.

If your ship doesn't have enough to feed all the people, you fail the mission.

Game by Eranot & Kazzter

Music by DavidKDB

Sound Effects by Kronbits
